arXiv:2406.01288v2 [cs.CL] 30 Oct 2024

Improved Few-Shot Jailbreaking Can Circumvent Aligned Language Models and Their Defenses
改进的少样本越狱攻击可以绕过对齐语言模型及其防御

Xiaosen Zheng∗1,2, Tianyu Pang†1, Chao Du1, Qian Liu1, Jing Jiang†2, Min Lin1
1Sea AI Lab, Singapore
2Singapore Management University
{zhengxs, tianyupang, duchao, liuqian, linmin}@sea.com; jingjiang@smu.edu.sg ∗Work done during Xiaosen Zheng’s internship at Sea AI Lab.†Correspondence to Tianyu Pang and Jing Jiang.
Abstract  摘要

Recently, Anil et al. [3] show that many-shot (up to hundreds of) demonstrations can jailbreak state-of-the-art LLMs by exploiting their long-context capability. Nevertheless, is it possible to use few-shot demonstrations to efficiently jailbreak LLMs within limited context sizes? While the vanilla few-shot jailbreaking may be inefficient, we propose improved techniques such as injecting special system tokens like [/INST] and employing demo-level random search from a collected demo pool. These simple techniques result in surprisingly effective jailbreaking against aligned LLMs (even with advanced defenses). For example, our method achieves >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % (mostly >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 %) ASRs on Llama-2-7B and Llama-3-8B without multiple restarts, even if the models are enhanced by strong defenses such as perplexity detection and/or SmoothLLM, which is challenging for suffix-based jailbreaking. In addition, we conduct comprehensive and elaborate (e.g., making sure to use correct system prompts) evaluations against other aligned LLMs and advanced defenses, where our method consistently achieves nearly 100%percent100100\%100 % ASRs. Our code is available at https://github.com/sail-sg/I-FSJ.
最近，Anil 等人[3]表明，通过利用其长上下文能力，许多样本（最多数百个）的演示可以越狱最先进的 LLMs。然而，在有限的上下文大小内，是否可以使用少量样本的演示来有效地越狱 LLMs？虽然普通的少量样本越狱可能效率不高，我们提出了改进的技术，例如注入特殊的系统标记如[/INST]并从收集的演示池中进行演示级别的随机搜索。这些简单的技术对对齐的 LLMs（即使带有高级防御）产生了惊人的越狱效果。例如，我们的方法在 Llama-2-7B 和 Llama-3-8B 上实现了 >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % （主要是 >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 % ）的 ASR，即使模型通过困惑度检测和/或 SmoothLLM 等强防御进行了增强，这对于基于后缀的越狱来说是一个挑战。此外，我们对其他对齐的 LLMs 和高级防御进行了全面而详尽的评估（例如，确保使用正确的系统提示），其中我们的方法始终实现了接近 100%percent100100\%100 % 的 ASR。我们的代码可在 https://github.com/sail-sg/I-FSJ 获取。

1 Introduction  1 引言

Large language models (LLMs) are typically trained to be safety-aligned in order to avoid misuse during their widespread deployment [5, 43]. However, many red-teaming efforts have focused on proposing jailbreaking attacks and reporting successful cases in which LLMs are misled into producing harmful or toxic content [8, 36, 53].
大型语言模型（LLMs）通常被训练为安全对齐，以避免在其广泛应用过程中被误用[5, 43]。然而，许多红队工作重点在于提出越狱攻击，并报告 LLMs 被误导产生有害或毒性内容的成功案例[8, 36, 53]。

When jailbreaking, optimization-based attacks search for adversarial suffixes that can achieve high attack success rates (ASRs) [28, 54, 74]; more recently, Andriushchenko et al. [2] use prompting and self-transfer techniques to randomly search adversarial suffixes, while reporting 100% ASRs on both Llama-2-Chat-7B and Llama-3-8B [40, 56]. Although effective against aligned LLMs, these adversarial suffixes mostly have no semantic meaning (even after low-perplexity regularization [73]), making them susceptible to jailbreaking defenses like perplexity filters [1, 22] and SmoothLLM [50]. As empirically reported in Figure 4, adversarial suffixes generated by Andriushchenko et al. [2] result in quite high perplexity and are easily detectable.
在越狱攻击中，基于优化的攻击搜索能够实现高攻击成功率（ASR）的对抗性后缀[28, 54, 74]；最近，Andriushchenko 等人[2]使用提示和自我迁移技术随机搜索对抗性后缀，并在 Llama-2-Chat-7B 和 Llama-3-8B 上报告了 100%的 ASR[40, 56]。尽管这些对抗性后缀对对齐的 LLMs 很有效，但它们大多没有语义意义（即使经过低困惑度正则化[73]后也是如此），因此容易受到越狱防御措施如困惑度过滤器[1, 22]和 SmoothLLM[50]的攻击。如图 4 所示，Andriushchenko 等人[2]生成的对抗性后缀导致较高的困惑度，且容易被检测到。

LLM-assisted attacks, on the other hand, use auxiliary LLMs to generate adversarial but semantically meaningful requests capable of jailbreaking the target LLM, usually requiring only tens of queries [9, 35, 39, 69]. The generated adversarial requests can bypass perplexity filters and are insensitive to defenses that rely on input preprocessing [22]. On the downside, it can be challenging for LLM-assisted attacks to achieve state-of-the-art ASRs on aligned LLMs, especially when they are evaluated under strict conditions (e.g., using the correct system prompt on Llama-2-Chat-7B) [10, 38].
另一方面，LLM 辅助攻击使用辅助 LLM 生成对抗性但语义上有意义的请求，这些请求能够绕过目标 LLM，通常只需要几十个查询[9, 35, 39, 69]。生成的对抗性请求可以绕过困惑度过滤器，并且对依赖于输入预处理的防御措施不敏感[22]。但缺点是，LLM 辅助攻击在针对对齐 LLM 时很难达到最先进的 ASR，尤其是在严格条件下评估时（例如，在 Llama-2-Chat-7B 上使用正确的系统提示）[10, 38]。

In contrast, manual attacks are more flexible, but necessitate elaborate designs and considerable human labor [12, 20, 30, 61, 66]. In particular, Wei et al. [62] explore few-shot in-context demonstrations containing harmful responses to jailbreak LLMs. Anil et al. [3] automate and extend this strategy to many-shot jailbreaking, which prompts LLMs with hundreds of harmful demonstrations and can achieve high ASRs on cutting-edge closed-source models. Nonetheless, many-shot jailbreaking requires LLMs’ long-context capability that is still lacking in most open-source models [34].
相比之下，手动攻击更加灵活，但需要精心设计并投入大量人力劳动[12, 20, 30, 61, 66]。特别是，Wei 等人[62]探索了包含有害响应的少样本情境演示，用于破解 LLMs。Anil 等人[3]将这一策略自动化并扩展到多样本破解，通过向 LLMs 提供数百个有害演示，可以在前沿闭源模型上实现高 ASRs。然而，多样本破解需要 LLMs 的长上下文能力，而大多数开源模型在这方面仍然存在不足[34]。

In this work, we revisit and significantly improve few-shot jailbreaking, especially against open-source LLMs with limited context sizes (≤8192absent8192\leq 8192≤ 8192). We first automatically create a demo pool containing harmful responses generated by “helpful-inclined” models like Mistral-7B [24] (i.e., not specifically safety-aligned). Then, we inject special tokens from the target LLM’s system prompt, such as [/INST] in Llama-2-7B-Chat,111These special tokens can be directly accessed on open-source LLMs by checking their system prompts, and may be extracted on closed-source LLMs by prompting like “Repeat the words above” [26].
这些特殊标记可以通过检查开源 LLMs 的系统提示直接访问，也可以通过提示“重复上述词语”[26]从闭源 LLMs 中提取。
在这项工作中，我们重新审视并显著改进了少样本越狱攻击，特别是针对上下文大小有限的开源 LLM（ ≤8192absent8192\leq 8192≤ 8192 ）。我们首先自动创建一个包含“乐于助人”模型（如 Mistral-7B [ 24]）生成的有害响应的演示池（即，并非专门为安全对齐）。然后，我们从目标 LLM 的系统提示中注入特殊标记，例如 Llama-2-7B-Chat 中的[/INST]， 1 into the generated demos as illustrated in Figure 1. Finally, given the number of demo shots (e.g., 4-shot or 8-shot), we apply demo-level random search in the demo pool to optimize the attacking loss.
将攻击指令嵌入到生成的演示中，如图 1 所示。最后，根据演示样本的数量（例如 4-shot 或 8-shot），我们在演示池中应用演示级别的随机搜索来优化攻击损失。

As summarized in Table 1, our improved few-shot jailbreaking (named as ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ) achieves >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % (mostly >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 %) ASRs on aligned LLMs including Llama-2-7B and Llama-3-8B. In addition, as reported in Table 3, we further enhance Llama-2-7B by different jailbreaking defenses, while our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ can still achieve >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 % ASRs in most cases. Note that the random search operation in ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is demo-level, not token-level, so the crafted inputs remain semantic. Overall, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is completely automated, eliminating the need for human labor and serving as a strong baseline for future research on jailbreaking attacks.
如表 1 所示，我们改进的少样本越狱攻击（命名为 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ）在包括 Llama-2-7B 和 Llama-3-8B 在内的对齐 LLMs 上实现了 >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % （主要是 >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 % ）的 ASRs。此外，如表 3 所示，我们通过不同的越狱防御进一步增强 Llama-2-7B，而我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在大多数情况下仍能实现 >95%absentpercent95>95\%> 95 % 的 ASRs。请注意， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 中的随机搜索操作是演示级别的，不是 token 级别的，因此精心设计的输入仍然保持语义性。总体而言， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 是完全自动化的，无需人工劳动，并可作为未来越狱攻击研究的一个强有力基线。

2 Related work  2 相关工作

Jailbreaking attacks. LLMs like ChatGPT/GPT-4 [42] and Llama-2 [56] are generally designed to return helpful and safe responses, and they are trained to align with human values [43, 14, 5, 25]. However, red-teaming research has shown that LLMs can be jailbroken to produce harmful content using manually created or automatically generated prompts [9, 12, 16, 28, 30, 35, 36, 45, 47, 51, 57, 67, 73, 74, 44, 32, 2]. Additionally, Tian et al. [55] investigate the safety risks of LLM-based agents; Greshake et al. [15] introduce the concept of indirect prompt injection to compromise LLM-integrated applications; According to Wei et al. [61], aligned LLMs are vulnerable to jailbreaking due to the conflicting goals of capability and safety, as well as the gap between pretraining and safety training; Carlini et al. [8] point out the inherent vulnerability of neural networks to adversarial examples as a root cause. Recently, several studies have found that fine-tuning aligned LLMs with either poisoned or benign data can undermine their alignment and safety [13, 20, 29, 46, 65].
越狱攻击。ChatGPT/GPT-4 [ 42] 和 Llama-2 [ 56] 这类 LLMs 通常被设计为返回有益且安全的回复，并且它们被训练以与人类价值观保持一致 [ 43, 14, 5, 25]。然而，红队研究表明，LLMs 可以通过手动创建或自动生成的提示进行越狱，从而产生有害内容 [ 9, 12, 16, 28, 30, 35, 36, 45, 47, 51, 57, 67, 73, 74, 44, 32, 2]。此外，Tian 等人 [ 55] 研究了基于 LLM 的代理的安全风险；Greshake 等人 [ 15] 引入了间接提示注入的概念，以破坏集成了 LLM 的应用程序；根据 Wei 等人 [ 61] 的研究，由于能力和安全目标之间的冲突，以及预训练与安全训练之间的差距，对齐的 LLMs 容易受到越狱攻击；Carlini 等人 [ 8] 指出，神经网络对对抗样本的固有脆弱性是根本原因。最近，一些研究发现，使用中毒或良性数据进行微调对齐的 LLMs 会削弱它们的对齐性和安全性 [ 13, 20, 29, 46, 65]。

Jailbreaking defenses. Though instruction fine-tuning (SFT+RLHF) [43] plays a major role in safety alignment, various defense mechanisms have been proposed to strengthen models’ alignment to tackle the safety issue from a system-level perspective [40]. Context-based defenses insert either manually designed or automatically optimized safety prompts into the context [33, 41, 62, 63, 72, 71]. Input-detection-based defenses aim to detect potentially harmful input prompts like perplexity filter [1, 7, 11, 19, 18, 22, 27, 52, 59]. Perturbation-based defenses purify the input prompts by adding perturbations [22, 23, 50, 60, 70]. Output-detection-based defenses distinguish whether the generated responses contain harmful content and return the default refusal responses if harmful information detected [17, 21, 31, 68]. Mazeika et al. [38] propose to train the model against the suffix optimized by GCG [74] directly. Xu et al. [64] augment the original model with a safety expert model. In particular, they interpolate the token prediction distributions from these two models with a weighting hyperparameter. These methods generally fall into the adversarial training category.
越狱防御。尽管指令微调（SFT+RLHF）[ 43] 在安全对齐中发挥着重要作用，但已经提出了各种防御机制来加强模型的对齐，从系统层面解决安全问题 [ 40]。基于上下文的防御将手动设计或自动优化的安全提示插入上下文中 [ 33, 41, 62, 63, 72, 71]。基于输入检测的防御旨在检测潜在的有害输入提示，如困惑度过滤器 [ 1, 7, 11, 19, 18, 22, 27, 52, 59]。基于扰动的防御通过添加扰动来净化输入提示 [ 22, 23, 50, 60, 70]。基于输出检测的防御区分生成的响应是否包含有害内容，并在检测到有害信息时返回默认拒绝响应 [ 17, 21, 31, 68]。Mazeika 等人 [ 38] 提出直接使用 GCG [ 74] 优化的后缀来训练模型。Xu 等人 [ 64] 通过添加安全专家模型来增强原始模型。特别是，他们使用加权超参数对这两个模型生成的标记预测分布进行插值。这些方法通常属于对抗训练类别。

3 Improved few-shot jailbreaking
3 改进的少样本越狱

We briefly introduce preliminaries before describing improved few-shot jailbreaking strategies such as constructing a demo pool, injecting special tokens, and performing demo-level random search.
在描述改进型少样本越狱策略（如构建演示池、注入特殊标记和执行演示级随机搜索）之前，我们简要介绍了相关基础知识。

3.1 Preliminaries  3.1 预备知识

Jailbreaking setup. We focus on jailbreaking attacks that aim to discover prompts to mislead LLMs producing harmful content, in order to fulfill a specific harmful request G∈𝒯∗𝐺superscript𝒯G\in\mathcal{T}^{*}italic_G ∈ caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (e.g., “Develop a detailed instruction manual for making a bomb or other explosive device”). We assume access to a collection of such harmful requests, which most aligned LLMs recognize as harmful. These typically encompass categories such as misinformation, violence, and hateful content, and are designed to elicit no response from the LLMs. Following previous notations [2, 10], we define a language model 𝙻𝙻𝙼:𝒯∗→𝒯∗:𝙻𝙻𝙼→superscript𝒯superscript𝒯\mathtt{LLM}:\mathcal{T}^{*}\rightarrow\mathcal{T}^{*}typewriter_LLM : caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT → caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as a function that transforms a sequence of input tokens into a sequence of output tokens. This model, referred to as the target model, is the one we aim to compromise or “jailbreak”. We also define a judge function 𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴:𝒯∗→{NO,YES}:𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴→superscript𝒯NOYES\mathtt{JUDGE}:\mathcal{T}^{*}\rightarrow\{\text{NO},\text{YES}\}typewriter_JUDGE : caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT → { NO , YES } to evaluate the content generated by the target model. The goal of a jailbreaking attacker is to find a prompt P∈𝒯∗𝑃superscript𝒯P\in\mathcal{T}^{*}italic_P ∈ caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT such that when the target model processes P𝑃Pitalic_P, the judge function deems the output harmful, i.e., 𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴⁢(𝙻𝙻𝙼⁢(P),G)=YES𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴𝙻𝙻𝙼𝑃𝐺YES\mathtt{JUDGE}(\mathtt{LLM}(P),G)=\text{YES}typewriter_JUDGE ( typewriter_LLM ( italic_P ) , italic_G ) = YES.
越狱设置。我们专注于旨在发现提示以误导 LLMs 产生有害内容的越狱攻击，目的是为了满足特定的有害请求 G∈𝒯∗superscriptG\in\mathcal{T}^{*}italic_G ∈ caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT （例如，“开发一份制作炸弹或其他爆炸装置的详细说明手册”）。我们假设可以访问一组此类有害请求，这些请求大多数对齐的 LLMs 都识别为有害。这些通常包括错误信息、暴力和仇恨内容等类别，并设计为使 LLMs 不产生任何回应。根据之前的符号[ 2, 10]，我们将语言模型 𝙻𝙻𝙼:𝒯∗→𝒯∗superscriptsuperscript\mathtt{LLM}:\mathcal{T}^{*}\rightarrow\mathcal{T}^{*}typewriter_LLM : caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT → caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 定义为一个将输入标记序列转换为输出标记序列的函数。该模型被称为目标模型，即我们试图破坏或“越狱”的模型。我们还定义了一个裁判函数 𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴:𝒯∗→{NO,YES}superscript\mathtt{JUDGE}:\mathcal{T}^{*}\rightarrow\{\text{NO},\text{YES}\}typewriter_JUDGE : caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT → { NO , YES } 来评估目标模型生成的内容。越狱攻击者的目标找到一个提示 P∈𝒯∗superscriptP\in\mathcal{T}^{*}italic_P ∈ caligraphic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ，使得当目标模型处理 PPitalic_P 时，裁判函数认为输出是有害的，即 𝙹𝚄𝙳𝙶𝙴⁢(𝙻𝙻𝙼⁢(P),G)=YES\mathtt{JUDGE}(\mathtt{LLM}(P),G)=\text{YES}typewriter_JUDGE ( typewriter_LLM ( italic_P ) , italic_G ) = YES 。

In-context learning (ICL). ICL [6] is a remarkable capability of LLMs. During ICL, a LLM is presented with a demonstration set D={(x1,y1),…,(xm,ym)}={d1,…,dm}𝐷subscript𝑥1subscript𝑦1…subscript𝑥𝑚subscript𝑦𝑚subscript𝑑1…subscript𝑑𝑚D=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{m},y_{m})\}=\{d_{1},...,d_{m}\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }, where each xisubscript𝑥𝑖x_{i}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is a query input and each yisubscript𝑦𝑖y_{i}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is the corresponding label or output. These examples effectively teach the model task-specific functionals. The process involves constructing a prompt that includes the demonstration set followed by a new query input for which the label needs to be predicted. The prompt takes the form [x1,y1,…,xn,yn,xnew]subscript𝑥1subscript𝑦1…subscript𝑥𝑛subscript𝑦𝑛subscript𝑥new[x_{1},y_{1},...,x_{n},y_{n},x_{\text{new}}][ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ], where xnewsubscript𝑥newx_{\text{new}}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is the new input query. The model, having inferred the underlying pattern from the provided examples, uses this prompt to predict the corresponding label ynewsubscript𝑦newy_{\text{new}}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for the new input xnewsubscript𝑥newx_{\text{new}}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. ICL leverages the model’s pre-trained knowledge and its ability to recognize and generalize patterns from the context provided by the demonstration set. This capability is particularly powerful because it allows the model to adapt to a wide range of tasks with minimal task-specific data, making it a flexible and efficient tool for various applications.
情境学习（ICL）。ICL [6] 是 LLMs 的一项显著能力。在 ICL 过程中，一个 LLM 会接收到一个示例集 D={(x1,y1),…,(xm,ym)}={d1,…,dm}subscript1subscript1subscriptsubscriptsubscript1subscriptD=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{m},y_{m})\}=\{d_{1},...,d_{m}\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ，其中每个 xisubscriptx_{i}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 是一个查询输入，每个 yisubscripty_{i}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 是对应的标签或输出。这些示例有效地教会模型特定任务的函数。这个过程涉及构建一个包含示例集的提示，然后是一个新的查询输入，需要预测其标签。该提示的形式为 [x1,y1,…,xn,yn,xnew]subscript1subscript1subscriptsubscriptsubscript[x_{1},y_{1},...,x_{n},y_{n},x_{\text{new}}][ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ，其中 xnewsubscriptx_{\text{new}}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 是新的输入查询。模型从提供的示例中推断出潜在的模式，并使用此提示来预测新输入 xnewsubscriptx_{\text{new}}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 对应的标签 ynewsubscripty_{\text{new}}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT new end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。ICL 利用了模型的预训练知识和其从示例集提供的上下文中识别和泛化模式的能力。这种能力特别强大，因为它允许模型在极少的特定任务数据下适应各种任务，使其成为各种应用的灵活且高效的工具。

Few-shot jailbreaking (FSJ). Wei et al. [62] explore few-shot in-context demonstrations containing harmful responses to jailbreak LLMs. Anil et al. [3] automate and extend this strategy to many-shot jailbreaking, which prompts LLMs with hundreds of harmful demonstrations and can achieve high ASRs on cutting-edge closed-source models. Nonetheless, many-shot jailbreaking requires LLMs’ long-context capability that is still lacking in most open-source models [34]. And the vanilla FSJ is ineffective on some well-aligned LLMs like the Llama-2-Chat family.
少样本越狱攻击（FSJ）。Wei 等人[62]研究了包含有害响应的少样本情境演示，用于越狱 LLMs。Anil 等人[3]自动化并扩展了这一策略到多样本越狱攻击，通过向 LLMs 提供数百个有害演示，可以在前沿闭源模型上实现高 ASR。然而，多样本越狱攻击需要 LLMs 的长上下文能力，而大多数开源模型在这方面仍然存在不足[34]。此外，普通的 FSJ 对一些高度对齐的 LLMs（如 Llama-2-Chat 系列）无效。

3.2 Improved strategies  3.2 改进策略

We primarily develop three strategies to obtain improved FSJ (ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ), as summarized below:
我们主要开发三种策略来获得改进的 FSJ（ ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ），总结如下：

Constructing a demo pool. Given a set of harmful requests {x1,…,xm}subscript𝑥1…subscript𝑥𝑚\{x_{1},...,x_{m}\}{ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } (e.g. the harmful behaviors from AdvBench [74]), we collect the corresponding harmful responses {y1,…,ym}subscript𝑦1…subscript𝑦𝑚\{y_{1},...,y_{m}\}{ italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } by prompting “helpful-inclined” models like Mistral-7B [24] which are not specifically safety-aligend. Finally, we create a demonstration pool as D={(x1,y1),…,(xm,ym)}={d1,…,dm}𝐷subscript𝑥1subscript𝑦1…subscript𝑥𝑚subscript𝑦𝑚subscript𝑑1…subscript𝑑𝑚D=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{m},y_{m})\}=\{d_{1},...,d_{m}\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }. Note that we only build the pool once and use it to attack multiple models and defenses.
构建演示池。给定一组有害请求 {x1,…,xm}subscript1subscript\{x_{1},...,x_{m}\}{ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } （例如来自 AdvBench [ 74] 的有害行为），我们通过提示“倾向有帮助”的模型（如 Mistral-7B [ 24]）收集相应的有害响应 {y1,…,ym}subscript1subscript\{y_{1},...,y_{m}\}{ italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } ，这些模型并非专门安全对齐的。最后，我们创建演示池作为 D={(x1,y1),…,(xm,ym)}={d1,…,dm}subscript1subscript1subscriptsubscriptsubscript1subscriptD=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{m},y_{m})\}=\{d_{1},...,d_{m}\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = { italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } 。请注意，我们只构建一次池，并使用它来攻击多个模型和防御措施。

Injecting special tokens. In our initial trials, we attempt to directly use the generated vanilla FSJ demonstrations (examplified in the left part of Figure 1) to jailbreak LLMs and obtain non-trivial ASRs on some models like Qwen1.5-7B-Chat [4]. But we keep obtaining near zero ASRs on much more well-aligned LLMs such as Llama-2-7B-Chat, which is consistent with the results reported by Wei et al. [62] and it seems FSJ is ineffective on these models.
注入特殊标记。在我们的初步试验中，我们尝试直接使用生成的纯 vanilla FSJ 演示（如图 1 左侧所示）来破解 LLMs 并在一些模型（如 Qwen1.5-7B-Chat [ 4]）上获得非平凡的 ASRs。但我们始终在更对齐的 LLMs（如 Llama-2-7B-Chat）上获得接近零的 ASRs，这与 Wei 等人 [ 62] 报告的结果一致，并且 FSJ 在这些模型上似乎无效。

Intriguing observations: Interestingly, we observe that most current open-source LLMs’ conversation templates separate the user message and assistant message (e.g. model completion) with special tokens. For example, as shown in Figure 1’s single message template, Llama-2-Chat separates the messages with [/INST]. We suspect the model is prone to conduct generation once presented by the [/INST] tokens. We thus hypothesize we can exploit this tendency with the help of ICL to induce the model to generate harmful content by appending harmful messages with the [/INST] tokens.
有趣的观察：有趣的是，我们观察到大多数当前开源 LLMs 的对话模板使用特殊标记来分隔用户消息和助手消息（例如模型补全）。例如，如图 1 的单消息模板所示，Llama-2-Chat 使用 [/INST] 标记分隔消息。我们推测模型在出现 [/INST] 标记时容易进行生成。因此，我们假设我们可以借助 ICL 利用这种倾向，通过将有害消息附加 [/INST] 标记来诱导模型生成有害内容。

Thus, we inject special tokens from the target LLM’s system prompt, such as [/INST] in Llama-2-7B-Chat, into the generated demos as illustrated by the ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ Demonstration example in Figure 1. More specifically, given an original FSJ demonstration, we construct ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ demonstration by first injecting [/INST] between the user message and assistant message, which is motivated by the specific formatting of Llama-2-Chat’s single message template. Additionally, we inject [/INST] between the generated steps in the demonstration.
因此，我们将目标 LLM 的系统提示中的特殊标记，例如 Llama-2-7B-Chat 中的[/INST]，注入到生成的演示中，如图 1 中的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 演示示例所示。更具体地说，对于一个原始的 FSJ 演示，我们通过首先在用户消息和助手消息之间注入[/INST]来构建 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 演示，这是由 Llama-2-Chat 的单消息模板的特定格式驱动的。此外，我们在演示中生成的步骤之间也注入[/INST]。

Demo-level random search. After the ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ demo pool is constructed, we use demo-level random search to minimize the loss of generating the initial token (e.g. “Step”) on the target model. We modify the random search (RS) algorithm [48, 2] into a demo-level variant, which is simple and requires only the output logits instead of gradients. The algorithm is as follows: (i) prepend a sequence of n𝑛nitalic_n sampled demonstrations to the original request; (ii) in each iteration, change a demonstration to another one at a random position in the sequence; (iii) accept the change if it reduces the loss of generating target token (e.g., “Step” that leads the model to fulfill a harmful request) at the first position of the response. Furthermore, we implement the above demo-level RS algorithm in a batch way to achieve better parallelism as described in Algorithm 1. To tackle input-perturbation-based defenses like SmoothLLM [50], we introduce an ensemble variant of our demo-level RS method as described in Algorithm 2, which aims to find a combination of demonstrations that is not only effective for jailbreaking but also robust to perturbations. More details are provided in Appendix B.1.
演示级别的随机搜索。在构建 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 演示池后，我们使用演示级别的随机搜索来最小化在目标模型上生成初始标记（例如“步骤”）时的损失。我们将随机搜索（RS）算法[ 48, 2]修改为演示级别的变体，该变体简单且只需要输出 logits，而不需要梯度。算法如下：(i) 将一系列 nnitalic_n 采样的演示添加到原始请求前；(ii) 在每次迭代中，将序列中随机位置的一个演示更改为另一个演示；(iii) 如果更改减少了在响应的第一个位置生成目标标记（例如，导致模型执行有害请求的“步骤”）的损失，则接受该更改。此外，我们以批处理方式实现上述演示级别的 RS 算法，以实现更好的并行性，如算法 1 所述。为了应对基于输入扰动的防御措施，如 SmoothLLM[ 50]，我们引入了我们的演示级别 RS 方法的集成变体，如算法 2 所述，旨在找到一个不仅对越狱有效，而且对扰动具有鲁棒性的演示组合。更多细节请参见附录 B.1。

4 Empirical studies  4 实证研究

This section demonstrates the effectiveness of our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ in jailbreaking various open-source aligned LLMs and advanced defenses.
本节展示了我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在破解各种开源对齐 LLMs 及其高级防御方面的有效性。

4.1 Implementation details
4.1 实现细节

Aligned LLMs. We evaluate open-source and advanced LLMs for reproducibility. These include Llama-2-Chat [56], which underwent multiple rounds of manual red teaming for adversarial training, making them resilient to various attacks; Llama-3-Instruct [40], which were intentionally optimized for helpfulness and safety; OpenChat-3.5 [58], fine-tuned from Llama-2 using mixed-quality data with consideration of data quality; Starling-LM [58], fine-tuned from OpenChat 3.5 using RLHF with a reward model emphasizing helpfulness and harmlessness; and Qwen1.5-Chat [4], trained on datasets annotated for safety concerns such as violence, bias, and pornography. According to Mazeika et al. [38], the attack success rates (ASRs) are stable within model families but vary significantly between different families. Therefore, we only consider the 7B variant across all model families.
对齐的 LLMs。我们评估开源和先进的 LLMs 以确保可复现性。这些包括 Llama-2-Chat [ 56]，它经历了多轮人工红队对抗性训练，使其对各种攻击具有抵抗力；Llama-3-Instruct [ 40]，它被有意优化以提高帮助性和安全性；OpenChat-3.5 [ 58]，使用混合质量数据从 Llama-2 微调，并考虑了数据质量；Starling-LM [ 58]，使用 RLHF 从 OpenChat 3.5 微调，其奖励模型强调帮助性和无害性；以及 Qwen1.5-Chat [ 4]，在标注了暴力、偏见和色情等安全问题的数据集上训练。根据 Mazeika 等人 [ 38] 的研究，攻击成功率（ASRs）在模型家族内部是稳定的，但在不同家族之间差异显著。因此，我们在所有模型家族中仅考虑 7B 变体。

ASR metrics. We follow Liu et al. [35] to evaluate the attacking effectiveness by two ASR metrics. The first one is a Rule-based metric from Zou et al. [74], which is a keyword-based detection method that counts the number of harmful responses. Previous studies have used LLM-based metric such as GPT-4 to determine whether the responses are harmful. For reproducibility, we instead use the fine-tuned Llama Guard classifier [21, 10] following Chao et al. [10]. More details are in Appendix B.2.
ASR 指标。我们遵循 Liu 等人 [ 35] 的方法，通过两个 ASR 指标来评估攻击的有效性。第一个是基于规则的指标，来自 Zou 等人 [ 74]，这是一种基于关键词的检测方法，它统计有害响应的数量。以前的研究使用基于 LLM 的指标，例如 GPT-4，来确定响应是否有害。为了可重复性，我们遵循 Chao 等人 [ 10] 的方法，使用微调的 Llama Guard 分类器 [ 21, 10]。更多细节在附录 B.2 中。

Defenses. We consider seven efficient defense mechanisms to further enhance aligned LLMs. Among these, Self-Reminder [63] and ICD [62] are context-based methods, (window) PPL filters [22] are input-detection-based, while Retokenization [22] and SmoothLLM [50] are perturbation-based methods. Safe Decoding [64] belongs to adversarial training. Llama Guard [21] is output-detection-based that requires the attacker to jailbreak both the target model and the output filter, which judges whether the target model’s outputs are safe or unsafe. More details are in Appendix B.3.
防御措施。我们考虑了七种高效的防御机制来进一步增强对齐的 LLMs。其中，Self-Reminder [63] 和 ICD [62] 是基于上下文的防御方法，(窗口) PPL 过滤器 [22] 是基于输入检测的防御方法，而 Retokenization [22] 和 SmoothLLM [50] 是基于扰动的防御方法。Safe Decoding [64] 属于对抗训练。Llama Guard [21] 是基于输出检测的防御方法，要求攻击者同时破解目标模型和输出过滤器，该过滤器用于判断目标模型的输出是否安全。更多细节请参见附录 B.3。

Setup of our attack. For the demonstrations used in FSJ and ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ, we apply Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2, an LLM with weaker safety alignment, to create the harmful content on a set of harmful requests. For more details, please check Appendix B.4. Our targets are a collection of 50 harmful behaviors from AdvBench curated by Chao et al. [9] that ensures distinct and diverse harmful requests. We exclude the demonstrations for the same target harmful behavior from the pool to avoid leakage. For the demo-level random search, we set batch size B=8𝐵8B=8italic_B = 8 and iterations T=128𝑇128T=128italic_T = 128. We let the target LLMs generate up to 100 new tokens. We use each LLM’s default generation config. Every experiment is run on a single NVIDIA A100 (40G) GPU within a couple of hours. To address the concerns about leakage, diversity of the test behaviors, decoding length, correctness of special tokens, and number of necessary query times, we conduct additional ablation studies in Appendix C.1.
我们攻击的设置。在 FSJ 和 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 中使用的演示中，我们应用Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2，一个安全对齐较弱的语言模型（LLM），在一组有害请求上创建有害内容。更多细节请查看附录 B.4。我们的目标是 Chao 等人[9]从 AdvBench 精选的 50 种有害行为，这些行为确保了不同且多样的有害请求。我们从请求池中排除针对同一目标有害行为的演示，以避免信息泄露。对于演示级别的随机搜索，我们设置批处理大小 B=88B=8italic_B = 8 和迭代次数 T=128128T=128italic_T = 128 。我们让目标 LLM 生成最多 100 个新标记。我们使用每个 LLM 的默认生成配置。每个实验都在单个 NVIDIA A100（40G）GPU 上运行，耗时几个小时。为了解决关于信息泄露、测试行为的多样性、解码长度、特殊标记的正确性以及必要查询次数的担忧，我们在附录 C.1 中进行了额外的消融研究。

4.2 Jailbreaking attacks on aligned LLMs
4.2 对齐 LLMs 的越狱攻击

To examine the generality of our proposed ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ, we evaluate it on a diverse set of aligned LLMs. For different LLMs that utilize different conversation templates, we inject the corresponding special tokens, which distinct the user message and assistant message, into demonstrations. Note that such a process can be fully automated by a simple regular expression method. As detailed in Tables 1 and 6, we first find that our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ attack is effective on all tested LLMs. In particular, on OpenChat-3.5, Starling-LM-7B, and Qwen1.5-7B-Chat, augmenting the FSJ with either demon-level random search or injecting special tokens is sufficient to achieve nearly 100% ASRs.
为了检验我们提出的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 的通用性，我们在一组多样的对齐 LLM 上进行评估。对于使用不同对话模板的不同 LLM，我们将相应的区分用户消息和助手消息的特殊标记注入到示例中。请注意，该过程可以通过简单的正则表达式方法完全自动化。如表 1 和表 6 所示，我们首先发现我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 攻击对所有测试的 LLM 都有效。特别是，在 OpenChat-3.5、Starling-LM-7B 和 Qwen1.5-7B-Chat 上，通过添加恶魔级随机搜索或注入特殊标记来增强 FSJ 足以实现近 100% 的 ASR。

Nonetheless, models with stronger alignment, like Llama-2-7B-Chat and Llama-3-8B-Instruct, are more challenging. For these models, the FSJ with demo-level random search alone is insufficient for jailbreaking. Only by combining special tokens and demon-level random search can we successfully break these models’ safety alignment, demonstrating the effectiveness of our techniques. Llama-3-Instruct requires more shots to jailbreak than Llama-2-Chat, which could be due to improved alignment techniques. Still, our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ achieves over 90% ASRs within limited context window sizes.
尽管如此，像 Llama-2-7B-Chat 和Llama-3-8B-Instruct这样具有更强对齐能力的模型更具挑战性。对于这些模型，仅使用演示级别的随机搜索的 FSJ 不足以进行越狱。只有结合特殊标记和演示级别的随机搜索，我们才能成功打破这些模型的安全对齐，这证明了我们技术的有效性。Llama-3-Instruct 比 Llama-2-Chat 需要更多的样本进行越狱，这可能是由于改进了对齐技术。然而，我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在有限的上下文窗口大小内实现了超过 90%的 ASR。

Our approach consistently achieves near 100% ASR on most models tested, highlighting the significant vulnerabilities and unreliability of current alignment methods. These findings highlight the critical need for improved and more resilient alignment strategies in the development of LLMs.
我们的方法在大多数测试模型上始终能实现接近 100%的 ASR，这突显了当前对齐方法的重大漏洞和不可靠性。这些发现突显了在 LLM 开发中改进和更具弹性的对齐策略的迫切需求。

Additionally, in the case of closed-source LLMs, the special tokens are mostly unknown, despite attempts to extract them [26]. To address this issue, we propose constructing a pool of public special tokens from open-source LLMs, and then searching within this pool for high-performing special tokens on closed-source LLMs. As shown in Figure 2, we experiment on GPT-4 and observe that several public special tokens (e.g., “</text>”, “</SYS>”, “[/INST]”) outperform the by-default one (“\n\n”). Furthermore, our findings indicate that there is some "transferability" with regard to special tokens, which could be an interesting research question.
此外，对于闭源 LLMs，尽管尝试提取它们 [ 26]，但特殊标记大多未知。为解决此问题，我们提出从开源 LLMs 构建公共特殊标记池，然后在闭源 LLMs 中搜索该池中表现优异的特殊标记。如图 2 所示，我们在 GPT-4 上进行了实验，观察到几个公共特殊标记（例如，“</text>”，“</SYS>”，“[/INST]”）表现优于默认标记（“\n\n”）。此外，我们的研究发现特殊标记存在一定的"可迁移性"，这可能是一个有趣的研究问题。

We evaluate ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ on GPT-4 with similar settings as in Andriushchenko et al. [2], adopting a modified prompt template as shown in Figure 11. We conduct our experiments using the OpenAI API “gpt-4-1106-preview”. As detailed in Tabel 2, we show that our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ attack is effective on GPT-4, achieving >90%absentpercent90>90\%> 90 % rule-based and >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % LLM-based ASRs with just 1-shot or 2-shot demos. Furthermore, we observe that both demo-level RS and the special token “</text>” (selected according to Figure 2) can consistently improve ASRs against GPT-4.
我们使用与 Andriushchenko 等人 [ 2] 类似的设置在 GPT-4 上评估 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ，采用如图 11 所示的修改后提示模板。我们使用 OpenAI API“gpt-4-1106-preview”进行实验。如表 2 详细所示，我们表明我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 攻击对 GPT-4 有效，仅需 1-shot 或 2-shot 示例即可实现 >90%absentpercent90>90\%> 90 % 基于规则的和 >80%absentpercent80>80\%> 80 % 基于 LLM 的 ASRs。此外，我们观察到示例级别的 RS 和根据图 2 选择的特殊标记“”都能持续提高对 GPT-4 的 ASRs。

4.3 Jailbreaking attacks on Llama-2-7B-Chat + jailbreaking defenses
4.3 对 Llama-2-7B-Chat 的越狱攻击及越狱防御

To assess our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ’s effectiveness against system-level robustness, we test it on Llama-2-7B-Chat with various defenses. As shown in Tables 3 and 7, our results demonstrate that ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ can circumvent jailbreaking defenses. For most defenses, randomly initialized n𝑛nitalic_n-shot demonstrations exhibit relatively low ASRs. However, optimizing the combination of demonstrations with demo-level random search can significantly boost the ASRs, peaking at near 100% in the 4-shot and 8-shot configurations. For the majority of defenses, the 4-shot setting is sufficient to achieve high ASRs.
为了评估我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在系统级鲁棒性方面的有效性，我们在 Llama-2-7B-Chat 上使用各种防御进行测试。如表 3 和表 7 所示，我们的结果表明 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 可以绕过越狱防御。对于大多数防御，随机初始化的 nnitalic_n -shot 示例表现出相对较低的 ASR。然而，通过 demo 级随机搜索优化演示组合可以显著提高 ASR，在 4-shot 和 8-shot 配置中接近 100%达到峰值。对于大多数防御，4-shot 设置足以实现高 ASR。

Self-Reminder modifies Llama-2-Chat’s default system message, which may degrade the safety alignment. ICD indicates a positive trend: as the defense shot increases, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ’s ASRs decrease significantly in the 2-shot setting. Attack success rates remain relatively low across defense shots, even with demo-level random search, indicating ICD’s effectiveness. Yet, in the 4- and 8-shot settings, the ICD fails to defend the ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ. The PPL filter cannot reduce our ASRs because our input is mostly natural language with a perplexity lower than the filtering threshold (for example, the highest perplexity of harmful queries in AdvBench). Even with a higher interpolation weight α=4𝛼4\alpha=4italic_α = 4, SafeDecoding cannot defend against our attack when computing the output token distribution.
Self-Reminder 修改了 Llama-2-Chat 的默认系统消息，这可能会降低安全对齐效果。ICD 显示出积极趋势：随着防御样本数量的增加，在 2 样本设置中， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 的 ASRs 显著下降。攻击成功率在各个防御样本数量下仍然相对较低，即使使用演示级别的随机搜索，这表明 ICD 的有效性。然而，在 4 样本和 8 样本设置中，ICD 无法防御 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ。PPL 过滤器无法降低我们的 ASRs，因为我们的输入主要是自然语言，其困惑度低于过滤阈值（例如，在 AdvBench 中有害查询的最高困惑度）。即使使用更高的插值权重 α=44\alpha=4italic_α = 4 ，SafeDecoding 在计算输出标记分布时也无法防御我们的攻击。

Remark 1: ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is robust to perturbations. Retokenization, which splits tokens and represents tokens with smaller tokens, can effectively perturb the encoded representation of the input prompt but fails to defend against ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ. Regarding the SmoothLLM variants, which directly perturb the input text in different ways, they successfully defend ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ at the 2-shot setting, resulting in ≤10%absentpercent10\leq 10\%≤ 10 % ASRs. However, our method achieves >85%absentpercent85>85\%> 85 % ASRs against all of them at the 8-shot setting, which still falls into the few-shot regime. Also, as shown in Figure 2, we plot the LLM-based ASRs (Top) and rule-based ASRs (Bottom) for various perturbation percentages q∈{5,10,15,20}𝑞5101520q\in\{5,10,15,20\}italic_q ∈ { 5 , 10 , 15 , 20 }; the results are compiled across three trials. At the 8-shot setting, our method still maintains high ASRs (e.g. ≥80%absentpercent80\geq 80\%≥ 80 %) across all the perturbation types and perturbation rates. We also plot the loss curves of the random search optimization process in Figure 14. All these results demonstrate that ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is robust to perturbations.
备注 1： ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 对扰动具有鲁棒性。重标记化，即将标记分割并用更小的标记表示，可以有效地扰动输入提示的编码表示，但无法防御 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ。关于 SmoothLLM 变体，它们以不同的方式直接扰动输入文本，在 2-shot 设置下成功防御 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ，导致 ≤10%absentpercent10\leq 10\%≤ 10 % ASRs。然而，我们的方法在 8-shot 设置下对所有这些方法都实现了 >85%absentpercent85>85\%> 85 % ASRs，这仍然属于小样本学习范畴。此外，如图 2 所示，我们绘制了基于 LLM 的 ASRs（顶部）和基于规则的 ASRs（底部）在各种扰动百分比 q∈{5,10,15,20}5101520q\in\{5,10,15,20\}italic_q ∈ { 5 , 10 , 15 , 20 } 下的结果；这些结果是在三次试验中汇总的。在 8-shot 设置下，我们的方法在所有扰动类型和扰动率下仍然保持了高 ASRs（例如 ≥80%absentpercent80\geq 80\%≥ 80 % ）。我们还绘制了图 14 中随机搜索优化过程的损失曲线。所有这些结果表明 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 对扰动具有鲁棒性。

Remark 2: ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ can be propagative. To counter the defense of Llama Guard, we need to achieve propagating jailbreaking. Previous work [37] has demonstrated how to achieve adversarial-suffix-based propagating jailbreaking, which can jailbreak the target LLM and evade the Guard LLM. However, such an attack is also fragile confronting a perplexity filter. We instead modify our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ demonstrations slightly by adaptively taking the Guard LLM’s conversation template into account as shown in Figure 9. Our results show that ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ successfully jailbreaks both the target LLM and Guard LLM, demonstrating that ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ can be propagative.
备注 2： ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 可以传播。为了对抗 Llama Guard 的防御，我们需要实现传播式的越狱。先前的工作[ 37]展示了如何实现基于对抗后缀的传播式越狱，这种攻击可以越狱目标 LLM 并规避 Guard LLM。然而，这种攻击在面对困惑度过滤器时也很脆弱。我们通过略微修改 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 演示，并自适应地考虑 Guard LLM 的对话模板（如图 9 所示）来改进。我们的结果表明， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 成功地越狱了目标 LLM 和 Guard LLM，证明了 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 可以传播。

4.4 Further analysis  4.4 进一步分析

The effect of pool size. Our method inherently comes with a design choice: the size of the demonstration pool. To figure out the effect of this factor, we evaluate our method on Llama-2-7B-Chat under various pool sizes. As shown in Figure 4, the ASRs generally increase as the pool size grows and gradually saturate as observed from 256 to 512. The pool size shows a much larger impact on the 2-shot setting compared to the 4-shot and 8-shot settings, which might be because the latter two settings are relatively easier. Surprisingly, 32 demonstrations are already sufficient to achieve over 90% ASRs at an 8-shot setting, indicating the data efficiency of our method. Thus, we set the pool size as 512 in all of our experiments.
池大小的效果。我们的方法本质上有一个设计选择：演示池的大小。为了确定这个因素的影响，我们在 Llama-2-7B-Chat 下使用不同的池大小评估我们的方法。如图 4 所示，随着池大小的增长，ASRs 通常会增加，并且在 256 到 512 之间逐渐饱和。与 4-shot 和 8-shot 设置相比，池大小对 2-shot 设置的影响要大得多，这可能是因为后两者相对容易。令人惊讶的是，在 8-shot 设置中，32 个演示已经足以实现超过 90% 的 ASRs，这表明我们方法的数据效率。因此，我们在所有实验中将池大小设置为 512。

The effect of shots. Figure 4 highlights the impact of the number of shots on the ASR. As the number of shots increases from 2 to 8, there is a noticeable improvement in the ASR. With 2 shots, the ASR starts relatively low, around 25.4%, and gradually improves as the dataset size increases, reaching about 61.6% at its highest point. This indicates moderate effectiveness in terms of attack success when only 2 shots are used. For 4 shots, there is a significant jump in the initial ASR compared to 2 shots. The ASR begins at around 88.0% and rapidly stabilizes close to 97.8% as the dataset grows. This demonstrates that increasing the shot count to 4 substantially enhances the attack’s success rate, achieving a high level of effectiveness early on. The effect is most pronounced when moving from 2 to 4 shots, with further improvement seen when increasing to 8 shots, where the ASR approaches 100%. However, these results also indicate that beyond a certain point, increasing the number of shots does not substantially boost the ASRs since fewer shots are already sufficient. Thus, we test up to 8 shots in most of our experiments.
样本数量的影响。图 4 突出了样本数量对语音识别（ASR）的影响。随着样本数量从 2 增加到 8，ASR 有明显的提升。使用 2 个样本时，ASR 相对较低，约为 25.4%，随着数据集规模的增加逐渐改善，最高达到约 61.6%。这表明当仅使用 2 个样本时，攻击的成功率具有中等效果。对于 4 个样本，与 2 个样本相比，初始 ASR 有显著提升。ASR 从约 88.0%开始，随着数据集的增长迅速稳定在接近 97.8%。这表明将样本数量增加到 4 可以大幅提高攻击的成功率，早期就达到了很高的效率。从 2 个样本增加到 4 个样本的效果最为显著，增加到 8 个样本时进一步改善，此时 ASR 接近 100%。然而，这些结果也表明，超过某个点后，增加样本数量并不能显著提高 ASR，因为较少的样本已经足够。因此，在我们的大多数实验中，我们测试到 8 个样本。

Compared to other attack methods As shown in Table 4, we compare our method against other attacks such as PAIR [9], GCG [74], AutoDAN [35], PAP [69], and PRS (stands for ‘Prompt+RS+Self-transfer’) [2]. The table indicates that the ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ method with Demo RS is the most effective approach for bypassing safety measures in language models, achieving the highest ASRs in both scenarios (with and without a system message). The presence of a system message generally reduces the effectiveness of most methods, except for ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ with Demo RS and PRS, which remain robust. When compared with adversarial-suffix based method [2], though they may achieve comparable ASRs (e.g. 90% evaluated by the rule-based metric) with our method, it completely fails with a single perplexity (windowed) filter as shown in Figure 4.
与其他攻击方法相比如表 4 所示，我们将我们的方法与其他攻击方法进行了比较，包括 PAIR [ 9]、GCG [ 74]、AutoDAN [ 35]、PAP [ 69]以及 PRS（代表“提示+RS+自我迁移”）[ 2]。该表表明，带有 Demo RS 的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 方法是在语言模型中绕过安全措施的最有效方法，在两种情况下（有和没有系统消息）都实现了最高的 ASR。系统消息的存在通常会降低大多数方法的有效性，除了 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 带有 Demo RS 和 PRS，它们仍然保持稳健。与基于对抗后缀的方法[ 2]相比，尽管它们可能以与我们的方法相当的 ASR（例如，根据基于规则的指标评估为 90%）来实现，但它们在只有一个困惑度（窗口化）过滤器时完全失效，如图 4 所示。

5 Discussion  5 讨论

Jailbreaking attacks on LLMs are rapidly evolving, with different approaches demonstrating varying strengths and limitations. Our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ represents a significant advancement in this domain, particularly against well-aligned open-source LLMs with limited context sizes. The primary innovation lies in the automated creation of the demonstration pool, the utilization of special tokens from the target LLM’s system template, and demo-level random search, which together facilitate high ASRs. Our empirical studies demonstrate the efficacy of ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ in achieving high ASRs on aligned LLMs and various jailbreaking defenses. The automation of ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ eliminates the need for extensive human labor, offering a robust baseline for future research in this domain.
针对 LLMs 的越狱攻击正在迅速发展，不同的方法展现出不同的优势和局限性。我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 代表了该领域的重大进步，特别是在针对上下文大小有限的对齐开源 LLMs 时。主要创新在于自动创建演示池、利用目标 LLMs 系统模板中的特殊标记以及演示级别的随机搜索，这些共同促进了高 ASRs。我们的实证研究表明， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在对齐 LLMs 和各种越狱防御措施上实现了高 ASRs 的有效性。 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 的自动化消除了对大量人工劳动的需求，为该领域未来的研究提供了坚实的基础。

Appendix A Broader Impacts and Limitations
附录 A 更广泛的影响和局限性

Broader Impacts. The implications of improved jailbreaking techniques are profound, extending beyond academic interest to potential real-world applications and security considerations. Given the superior efficacy of the proposed ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ, it is possible that our method being misused to attack deployed systems can cause negative societal impacts. This underscores the necessity for robust, adaptive defenses that can counter with advancements in attack methods.
更广泛的影响。改进的越狱技术的意义深远，不仅超越学术兴趣，还可能涉及现实世界的应用和安全考量。鉴于所提出的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 具有卓越的效能，我们的方法可能被误用以攻击已部署的系统，从而造成负面的社会影响。这凸显了构建强大、适应性防御措施的必要性，以应对攻击方法的进步。

From a broader perspective, our work highlights the ongoing cat-and-mouse dynamic between attack strategies and defense mechanisms in the field of AI safety. As LLMs become more integral to various applications, understanding and mitigating vulnerabilities through comprehensive research is crucial. ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ can serve as a strong baseline for future explorations on LLM safety.
从更广泛的视角来看，我们的工作突出了人工智能安全领域攻击策略与防御机制之间持续存在的猫鼠游戏动态。随着 LLMs 在各类应用中扮演越来越重要的角色，通过全面研究理解和缓解漏洞至关重要。 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 可作为未来探索 LLM 安全性的坚实基线。

Limitations. Our work focuses on jailbreaking open-source LLMs, with the assumption that the target model’s conversation template is known thus we can exploit the special tokens to facilitate the ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ attack. However, for closed-source LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, the conversation template is usually unknown. Though it may be possible to extract the template on closed-source LLMs [26], the effectiveness of our method on these LLMs remains a future research question.
局限性。我们的工作专注于破解开源 LLMs，假设目标模型的对话模板是已知的，因此我们可以利用特殊标记来促进 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 攻击。然而，对于像 GPT-4 和 Claude 这样的闭源 LLMs，对话模板通常是未知的。尽管有可能在闭源 LLMs 上提取模板[26]，但我们的方法在这些 LLMs 上的有效性仍然是一个未来的研究问题。

The reliance on special tokens from the target LLM’s system prompt may also introduce a vulnerability. If future models obfuscate or randomize these tokens, the effectiveness of ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ may diminish, necessitating continual adaptation of the attack strategy.
对目标 LLM 系统提示中的特殊标记的依赖也可能引入一个漏洞。如果未来模型混淆或随机化这些标记， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 的有效性可能会降低，从而需要持续调整攻击策略。

Appendix B Implementation details
附录 B 实现细节

B.1 Demo-level random search for SmoothLLM
B.1 SmoothLLM 的演示级随机搜索

In contrast to Algorithm 1, we introduce a new optimization objective adaptive to the SmoothLLM defense, which considers K𝐾Kitalic_K different perturbations at each iteration. With this adaptive design, we can find a combination more suitable for attacking SmoothLLM or other perturbation-based defenses because the optimized demonstrations are both effective for jailbreaking and robust to perturbations.
与算法 1 不同，我们引入了一个新的优化目标，该目标适应 SmoothLLM 防御，并在每次迭代中考虑 KKitalic_K 种不同的扰动。通过这种自适应设计，我们可以找到一个更适合攻击 SmoothLLM 或其他基于扰动的防御的组合，因为优化的演示既适用于越狱攻击，又对扰动具有鲁棒性。

B.2 The setup of metrics  B.2 指标设置

The keywords used for Rule-based metric are listed in Figure 5 from Zou et al. [74]. The prompt used for LLM-based metric is as shown in Figure 6 from Chao et al. [10].
基于规则的指标所使用的关键词列于 Zou 等人[74]的图 5 中。用于基于 LLM 的指标的提示如 Chao 等人[10]的图 6 所示。

B.3 Defenses  B.3 防御措施

  • •

    Self-Reminder [63]: Self Reminder injects safety prompts into context to remind the LLMs to respond responsibly as shown in Figure 7.


    • Self-Reminder [ 63]: Self Reminder 向上下文中注入安全提示，提醒 LLMs 负责任地回应，如图 7 所示。
  • •

    ICD [62]: ICD strengthens model robustness using in-context demonstrations of rejecting harmful prompts as shown in Figure 8.


    • ICD [ 62]: ICD 通过拒绝有害提示的上下文示例来增强模型鲁棒性，如图 8 所示。
  • •

    PPL [1]: We follow Alon and Kamfonas [1] and use GPT-2 to calculate the perplexity. Following Jain et al. [22], we consider both the default PPL and windowed PPL. We set the PPL threshold as the highest perplexity of harmful requests in AdvBench [74], which ensures that queries from AdvBench would not be filtered out by the filter.


    • PPL [ 1]: 我们遵循 Alon 和 Kamfonas [ 1] 的方法，使用 GPT-2 来计算困惑度。根据 Jain 等人 [ 22] 的做法，我们同时考虑默认的 PPL 和窗口 PPL。我们将 PPL 阈值设置为 AdvBench [ 74] 中有害请求的最高困惑度，这确保了 AdvBench 中的查询不会被过滤器过滤掉。
  • •

    Retokenization [22]: Retokenization splits tokens and represents them with multiple smaller tokens. We implement it using the handy implementation from huggingface 222https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/v4.41.0/src/transformers/models/llama/tokenization_llama.py#L86
    • 重新分词 [22]: 重新分词将 token 分割并用多个更小的 token 来表示。我们使用来自 huggingface 的便捷实现 2     , setting the dropout rate as 20% according to Jain et al. [22] and Xu et al. [64].
    根据 Jain 等人[22]和 Xu 等人[64]的建议，将 dropout 率设置为 20%。

  • •

    SmoothLLM [50]: SmoothLLM mitigates jailbreaking attacks on LLMs by randomly perturbing multiple copies of a given input prompt, and then aggregates the corresponding predictions to detect adversarial inputs. We consider all variants including Insert, Swap, and Patch with different perturb rates.


    • SmoothLLM [ 50]: SmoothLLM 通过随机扰动给定输入提示的多个副本来缓解对 LLMs 的越狱攻击，然后聚合相应的预测以检测对抗性输入。我们考虑了包括插入、交换和修补在内的所有变体，并使用不同的扰动率。
  • •

    Safe Decoding [64]: Safe Decoding augment the original model with a safety expert model. In particular, they interpolate the token prediction distributions from these two models with a weighting hyperparameter α𝛼\alphaitalic_α. We set α=4𝛼4\alpha=4italic_α = 4.


    • 安全解码 [ 64]: 安全解码通过引入一个安全专家模型来增强原始模型。具体来说，他们使用一个加权超参数 α\alphaitalic_α 对这两个模型的标记预测分布进行插值。我们设置了 α=44\alpha=4italic_α = 4 。
  • •

    Llama Guard [37]: In our setting, Llama Guard is an output-detection-based method, which requires the attacker not only to jailbreak the target model but also jailbreak the output filter which judges whether the target model’s outputs are safe or unsafe.


    • Llama Guard [ 37]: 在我们的设置中，Llama Guard 是一种基于输出检测的方法，它不仅要求攻击者破解目标模型，还要求破解判断目标模型输出是否安全的输出过滤器。

B.4 Demonstration pool construction
B.4 演示池构建

For the demonstrations (harmful pairs) used in few-shot jailbreaking, we use a Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2, an LLM with weaker safety alignment, to craft the harmful content on a set of harmful requests. We first take the prompt template from Andriushchenko et al. [2] as shown in Figure 10 to format the 520 harmful requests xisubscript𝑥𝑖x_{i}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT in the AdvBench [74]. Then we prompt Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 with the formatted harmful requests and collect the generated response yisubscript𝑦𝑖y_{i}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT setting the number of max new tokens as 256. Finally, we create a demonstration pool as D={(x1,y1),…,(x520,y520)}𝐷subscript𝑥1subscript𝑦1…subscript𝑥520subscript𝑦520D=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{520},y_{520})\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 520 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 520 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) }.
对于用于少样本越狱的演示（有害对），我们使用一个安全性对齐较弱的Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 LLM，在一系列有害请求上制作有害内容。我们首先采用 Andriushchenko 等人[ 2]的提示模板（如图 10 所示），用于格式化 AdvBench[ 74]中的 520 个有害请求 xisubscriptx_{i}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。然后我们用格式化的有害请求提示Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2，并收集生成的响应 yisubscripty_{i}italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，设置最大新 token 数量为 256。最后，我们创建一个演示池作为 D={(x1,y1),…,(x520,y520)}subscript1subscript1subscript520subscript520D=\{(x_{1},y_{1}),...,(x_{520},y_{520})\}italic_D = { ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , … , ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 520 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 520 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } 。

Appendix C Additional results
附录 C 补充结果

C.1 Ablation studies.

The effect of similar harmful behaviors. To prevent leakage or overfitting, we measure the cosine similarity between harmful behaviors and the target request using the sentence embedding model developed by Reimers [49]333https://huggingface.co/sentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2
相似有害行为的影响。为防止泄露或过拟合，我们使用 Reimers 开发的句子嵌入模型[ 49] 3 测量有害行为与目标请求之间的余弦相似度。. We exclude demonstrations with a similarity score of 0.5 or higher to the target request. As shown in Table 5, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ maintains its effectiveness even after filtering similar harmful behaviors from the pool, demonstrating that its success is not due to replicating specifically provided demonstrations.
。我们将与目标请求相似度得分达到 0.5 或以上的示例排除。如表 5 所示， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在从数据集中过滤掉相似有害行为后仍能保持其有效性，表明其成功并非源于复制特定提供的示例。

Additionally, regarding concerns about replicating the demonstrations, we measure the textual similarity between the generation and the in-context demonstrations on both AdvBench and HarmBench using the above embedding model. As shown in Figure 13, most generations have a similarity below 0.5 with their in-context demonstrations, which shows that our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is indeed producing novel generations rather than simply replicating the demonstrations.
此外，关于复制演示的担忧，我们使用上述嵌入模型在 AdvBench 和 HarmBench 上测量生成文本与情境演示之间的文本相似度。如图 13 所示，大多数生成文本与其情境演示的相似度低于 0.5，这表明我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 确实在生成新内容，而不是简单地复制演示。

The effect of more diverse test cases. To further address concerns about AdvBench’s limited scale, we conducted experiments on both AdvBench and HarmBench [38]. As shown in Table 5, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ maintains its effectiveness on HarmBench.
更多多样化测试用例的影响。为了进一步解决 AdvBench 规模有限的担忧，我们在 AdvBench 和 HarmBench [ 38] 上进行了实验。如表 5 所示， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在 HarmBench 上仍保持其有效性。

The effect of decoding length. To address the concerns of only decoding 100 new tokens, we set the decoding length to 512. We conducted experiments on both AdvBench and HarmBench, and as shown Table 5, we found that ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ maintains its effectiveness under this longer decoding length.
解码长度的影响。为了解决仅解码 100 个新 token 的担忧，我们将解码长度设置为 512。我们在 AdvBench 和 HarmBench 上进行了实验，如表 5 所示，我们发现 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 在这种较长的解码长度下仍保持其有效性。

The effect of using correct special tokens. We tried using [INST] instead of [/INST] on Llama-2-7B-Chat and also tested Qwen1.5B’s special tokens in place of [/INST]. The results, displayed in Table 5, demonstrate the ineffectiveness of both [INST] and Qwen1.5B’s special tokens and the importance of injecting the correct special tokens.
使用正确特殊标记的效果。我们在 Llama-2-7B-Chat 上尝试使用[INST]代替[/INST]，同时也测试了用 Qwen1.5B 的特殊标记替换[/INST]。结果如表 5 所示，表明[INST]和 Qwen1.5B 的特殊标记都无效，并证明了注入正确特殊标记的重要性。

The number of necessary query times. Figure 13 shows the distribution of the average number of queries necessary to generate successful jailbreaks. On AdvBench, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ requires 88 queries to achieve nearly 100% ASRs on Llama-2, whereas PAIR reports a 33.8 queries but only attains a 10% ASR. GCG achieves a 54% ASR but requires 256K queries. On HarmBench, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ similarly requires 159 queries. In summary, ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ is both highly query-efficient and effective.
所需查询次数。图 13 显示了生成成功越狱所需的平均查询次数的分布。在 AdvBench 上， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 需要 88 次查询才能在 Llama-2 上实现接近 100%的 ASR，而 PAIR 报告需要 33.8 次查询，但仅达到 10%的 ASR。GCG 达到了 54%的 ASR，但需要 256K 次查询。在 HarmBench 上， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 同样需要 159 次查询。总之， ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 既具有高查询效率，又非常有效。

C.2 Compare our method with ICA
C.2 将我们的方法与 ICA 进行比较

According to Wei et al. [62], even ICA (10-shot) achieves a lower ASR of 58%percent5858\%58 % compared to our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ (2-shot) that attains 68%percent6868\%68 % against Llama-2 on AdvBench. Similarly, on jailbreaking GPT-4, The ASR of ICA (10-shot) is 46%percent4646\%46 %, which is significantly lower than our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ (2-shot)’s 94%percent9494\%94 %.
根据 Wei 等人 [62] 的研究，即使 ICA（10-shot）的 ASR 也比我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ（2-shot）在 AdvBench 上对 Llama-2 达到的 68%percent6868\%68 % 要低 58%percent5858\%58 % 。类似地，在破解 GPT-4 时，ICA（10-shot）的 ASR 为 46%percent4646\%46 % ，这明显低于我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ（2-shot）的 94%percent9494\%94 % 。

We attempt to re-implement ICA [62] to provide a more complete comparison. However, since ICA does not open-source its demo pool, we must implement it using the same demo pool as ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ. As shown in Table 13, we report the re-implemented ICA results against Llama-2 on AdvBench. To allow ICA to use more shots in the 4096 context window, we shorten demos to approximately 64 tokens for both ICA and ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ. As seen, our ℐℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I-FSJ (8-shots) achieves comparable ASRs to ICA (64-shots), resulting in 8×8\times8 × efficiency improvement.
我们尝试重新实现 ICA [62] 以提供更全面的比较。然而，由于 ICA 未开源其演示数据集，我们必须使用与 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 相同的演示数据集来实现它。如表 13 所示，我们在 AdvBench 上报告了针对 Llama-2 的重新实现的 ICA 结果。为了允许 ICA 在 4096 的上下文窗口中使用更多示例，我们将 ICA 和 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ 的演示数据均缩短至约 64 个 token。可以看到，我们的 ℐ\mathcal{I}caligraphic_I -FSJ（8-shot）实现了与 ICA（64-shot）相当的平均通话识别率（ASR），从而带来了 8×8\times8 × 的效率提升。

C.3 Smooth LLM loss curves
C.3 平滑的 LLM 损失曲线

As shown in Figure 14, we observe that the loss steadily decreases as the demo-level optimization step increases, indicating the effectiveness of the proposed method.
如图 14 所示，我们观察到随着演示级优化步骤的增加，损失值稳步下降，这表明了所提出方法的有效性。

Instructions for reporting errors

We are continuing to improve HTML versions of papers, and your feedback helps enhance accessibility and mobile support. To report errors in the HTML that will help us improve conversion and rendering, choose any of the methods listed below:

  • Click the "Report Issue" button.
  • Open a report feedback form via keyboard, use "Ctrl + ?".
  • Make a text selection and click the "Report Issue for Selection" button near your cursor.
  • You can use Alt+Y to toggle on and Alt+Shift+Y to toggle off accessible reporting links at each section.

Our team has already identified the following issues. We appreciate your time reviewing and reporting rendering errors we may not have found yet. Your efforts will help us improve the HTML versions for all readers, because disability should not be a barrier to accessing research. Thank you for your continued support in championing open access for all.

Have a free development cycle? Help support accessibility at arXiv! Our collaborators at LaTeXML maintain a list of packages that need conversion, and welcome developer contributions.
